name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ebay safe products (not affiliated with ebay)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Only shows Ebay Products with sellers that are top rated and products with the 'ebay refurbished' indicator

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Only shows eBay Products with sellers that are top rated and products with the 'ebay refurbished' indicator. This is not meant to attack sellers that are not top rated, but rather to help shoppers who want to play it safe rather than look for deals. This is not affiliated with eBay Inc. and the verified icon within the extension icon is only there to illustrate that only products that are eBay refurbished or sold by top rated sellers will be shown. If you feel that the verified icon within the extension icon should be removed, please let me know and I will try to replace it with something else
